data.title: Gauhati University Distance Education Admission 2024
data.meta_description: August 12, 2024 Gauhati University Distance Education Admission: Gauhati University Distance Education offers a variety of undergraduate (UG) and postgraduate (PG) programs for the 2024-25 session. Admissions have started and the last date to apply is 31 August 2024. For UG courses like BCA , B.Sc. IT , BA , and B.Com , eligibility requires passing 10+2 or a 3-year Polytechnic Diploma. PG courses such as M.Com , M.Sc. IT , MA in Assamese, English, Economics, History, and Political Science require a relevant bachelor's degree with at least 50-55% marks. The application fee is INR 250, with specific course fees detailed on the official website. SC/ST/OBC candidates are eligible for relaxation in admission criteria. For more details and to apply, visit the official website
data.text:
Gauhati University Distance Education Admission: Gauhati University Distance Education offers a variety of undergraduate (UG) and postgraduate (PG) programs for the 2024-25 session. Admissions have started and the last date to apply is 31 August 2024. For UG courses like BCA , B.Sc. IT , BA , and B.Com , eligibility requires passing 10+2 or a 3-year Polytechnic Diploma. PG courses such as M.Com , M.Sc. IT , MA in Assamese, English, Economics, History, and Political Science require a relevant bachelor’s degree with at least 50-55% marks. The application fee is INR 250, with specific course fees detailed on the official website. SC/ST/OBC candidates are eligible for relaxation in admission criteria. For more details and to apply, visit the official website

Gauhati University Distance Education Top Importance Points

Application deadline: Gauhati University Admission process for the July 2024 session is ongoing and the end date for admission finalization is the 31st of August 2024. Source

Eligibility Criteria: To pursue an undergraduate/Diploma/Certificate course, you need a 10+2 with 50% marks while admission to a PG/PGD course is granted on the basis of a bachelor’s degree in a relevant degree.

Entrance Exams: Admission at Gauhati University in distance learning is granted on the basis of academic performance without any entrance test.

Top courses: BA, B.COM, B.SC, M.SC, MCA, CCA, PG Diploma, and Certificate courses.

Average Fee: The total course fees for the BA General is Rs. 2,000/- & for B. Com Rs. 2,500/- per semester, Fees for both MA/M.COM courses: INR 5,000/- per semester, For IT program fees: INR 14,500/-.

How to Apply: Gauhati University distance education application form 2024 is live on the official website.

Approval: It is recognized by the UGC and approved by the Distance Education Bureau (DEB).​

Gauhati University Distance Education Latest Updates

Gauhati University: Key Courses are BCA, BSc, BA, IT, BCom, MCom, MSc and MA. Eligibility: Students must have completed the 12th class for UG courses and a Graduation degree in a related field for PG course admissions. Admission Last date: 31 August 2024. Apply Now

What’s New at Gauhati University Distance Education in 2024?

Event Details Date/Approx. Fees Admission Start Date Online registration begins July 2024 Last Date to Apply Deadline for application submissions August 31, 2024 UG Courses Offered B.Sc. IT, BA (General), B.Com. (General) Fees vary, e.g., B.Sc. IT is approx. INR 48,000 per year PG Courses Offered M.Com., M.Sc. IT, MA in various subjects like English, Assamese, etc. Fees vary, e.g., MA courses are approx. INR 14,000 per year PG Diploma Courses Business Management, Human Resource Management, and more Approx. INR 7,000 per course

What’s New at Gauhati University Distance Education in 2024?

Gauhati University Distance Education Approvals and Accreditations:

University Grants Commission (UGC)

Distance Education Bureau (DEB)

National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC)

Association of Indian Universities (AIU)

Reservation Policy:

Relaxation in eligibility criteria for SC/ST/OBC candidates as per government norms

Reservation of seats for different categories in select programs

Gauhati University Distance Education Eligibility Criteria:

UG Programs:

BA: 10+2 in any stream, fees approx Rs. 8,000 per year

BCom: 10+2 with minimum 45%, fees approx Rs. 10,000 per year

BSc: 10+2 with Science, fees approx Rs. 15,000 per year

BCA: 10+2 with minimum 45%, fees approx Rs. 25,000 per year

PG Programs:

MA: Graduation with minimum 45%, fees approx Rs. 10,000-15,000 per year

MCom: BCom with minimum 50%, fees approx Rs. 14,000 total

MSc IT: BSc/BCA with minimum 50%, fees approx Rs. 30,000 per year

Diploma and Certificate Programs:

1-year PG Diplomas: Graduation in any stream, fees approx Rs. 7,000-10,000

6-month Certificate courses: 10+2 in any stream, fees approx Rs. 5,000

Gauhati University Distance Education Highlights:

Highlight Details University Name Gauhati University Short Name GUCDOE Mode of Education Distance and Online Departments Arts, Science, Commerce, IT Popular Courses BA, BCom, BCA, MA, MCom, MBA Mode of Admission Online and Study Center Selection Criteria Merit-based Entrance Exam NA University Type Public State University Website www.gucdoe.in Application Fee Rs. 250-300 Approvals UGC, DEB, NAAC, AIU Reservation As per government norms

How to Apply for GUCDOE Admission 2024-25?

Gauhati University provides multiple courses under the UG, PG, Diploma, and Certificate level programs. Courses offered by the university are BA, BCom, BSc in Information Technology, MCom, MSc Journalism, PG Diploma in Computer Application, Certificate in Computer Application, Certificate Course in Nursery Management, etc.

UG Admission Process

UG Admission Process Eligibility Criteria Students need to pass 10+2 education from a recognised board. Application Candidates need to visit official website of the university gucdoesrm.in/gucdoeadmission/ and submit applications with the required documents. Selection Applicants are selected on the basis of their merit marks in the last qualifying examination. Document Verification After submission of the application form, students have to submit their documents for verification.

PG Admission Process

PG Admission Process Eligibility Criteria Interested applicants require undergraduate degree in the same or an equivalent field with a minimum of 50% mark and 45% for SC/ ST/ OBC categories from a well-known university. Application Students need to submit their applications along with copies of the required documents at the official site of the university. Apply Here Selection Applicants are selected on the basis of a merit list which is prepared by the university. Document Verification After submission of the application form, students need to verify their submitted documents.

Reservation Policy

Seats will be reserved for SC/ Schedule Tribe, Plains (S.T.P.)/ Schedule Tribe, Hills (S.T.H.)/ OBC/ MOBC/ PWD/ EWS, and Sports and Extracurricular activity quota will be according to the reservation policy of the Assam Government.

Scholarships

Gauhati University provides various scholarship schemes such as Gauhati University External Fellowship, Internal Fellowship, Internal Fellowship and MHRD- DRDO Fellowship (MHRD- Defence Research Development Organisation).

How To Apply

Online Application:

Visit the Gauhati University IDOL Admission portal

Complete the registration process by filling the application form with necessary details.

Upload scanned copies of the necessary documents.

Pay the application fee online, which ranges from ₹300 to ₹500, depending on the course.

Submit the application and print the confirmation page for future reference.

Offline Admission:

Visit the GU IDOL office or the nearest study center.

Get the application form.

Submit the form along with required documents such as mark sheets and passport-size photos.

Complete the admission process on the spot by paying the admission fee.

GUCDOE UG and PG Programs 2024-25:

UG Programs:

Bachelor of Arts (BA)

Bachelor of Commerce (BCom)

Bachelor of Science (BSc)

Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA)

PG Programs:

Master of Arts (MA) in Assamese, English, Economics, History, Political Science, Mathematics, Philosophy, Bengali, Bodo, Mass Communication, Education, Sanskrit

Master of Commerce (MCom)

Master of Science (MSc) in IT

PG Diploma Programs:

PGD in Human Resource Management

PGD in Journalism and Mass Communication

PGD in Computer Applications

PGD in Sales and Marketing Management

PGD in Business Management

PGD in Financial Management

PGD in Insurance Management

PGD in Banking and Financial Services

Certificate Programs:

Certificate in Computer Applications

Certificate Course in Retail Trade

GUCDOE Distance Education UG Courses Admission 2024:

Course Name Eligibility Criteria Approx. Fee (Per Year) Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) Passed 10+2 or equivalent ₹5,000 – ₹8,000 Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.) Passed 12th examination or equivalent ₹5,000 – ₹10,000 Bachelor of Science (B.Sc.) 10+2 in Science stream ₹10,000 – ₹15,000

GUCDOE Distance Education PG Courses Admission 2024

Course Name Eligibility Criteria Approx. Fee (Per Year) Master of Arts (M.A.) Graduation in relevant discipline ₹6,000 – ₹12,000 Master of Commerce (M.Com.) Graduation degree in Commerce ₹6,000 – ₹14,000 Master of Science (M.Sc.) Undergraduate in Science field ₹10,000 – ₹30,000

Gauhati University Distance Education Diploma Course Admission 2024:

Course Name Eligibility Criteria Approx. Fee (Total) PG Diploma in Human Resource Management Graduation in any discipline ₹7,000 – ₹10,000 PG Diploma in Computer Applications Graduation qualification in any discipline ₹7,000 – ₹10,000 Diploma in Journalism and Mass Communication Intermediate or equivalent ₹7,000 – ₹12,000

Gauhati University Distance Education Application Form 2024-25

Steps Process Step 1

Visit the official website of GUCDOE at www.gucdoe.in

Step 2

Click on the “Admissions 2024” tab and select your desired program

Step 3

Read the eligibility criteria, fee structure and other details carefully

Step 4

Click on the “Apply Now” button and register yourself with a valid email ID and mobile number

Step 5

Fill up the online application form with your personal, academic and contact details

Step 6

Upload scanned copies of your photograph, signature and relevant documents like marksheets, certificates etc.

Step 7

Pay the application fee of Rs. 350 online through net banking, credit/debit card or UPI

Step 8

Preview your application and submit it. Take a printout for future reference.

Documents Required:

The list of documents required may vary by program, but generally includes:

Recent Passport-size Photograph

10th and 12th Marksheet

Graduation Certificate (For PG and Diploma courses)

ID Proof (Aadhar card, Voter ID, or any other valid ID)

Caste Certificate (if applicable)

Signature

SEE ALSO: MBA Distance Education Admission 2024

Gauhati University Distance Education Scholarship:

Merit scholarships for students scoring high marks in qualifying exams

Fee waivers for economically weaker sections

SC/ST scholarships as per government norms

Special scholarships for Female students and differently-abled students

For more details on scholarships, visit the university website or contact the scholarship cell.

Gauhati University Centre for Distance and Online Education (GUCDOE)

Address: GUCDOE, GU Campus, Jalukbari, Guwahati – 781014, Assam

Website: www.gucdoe.in

Email: admission@gucdoe.in

Phone: +91-361-2570422/23

Conclusion:

GUCDOE is a pioneer in distance education, offering quality programs across Arts, Science, Commerce, IT, and Management disciplines. With a student-centric approach, experienced faculty, and state-of-the-art learning resources, GUCDOE provides a conducive environment for academic growth and skill development. The admission process is transparent and straightforward, with scholarships available for deserving students. Join GUCDOE and achieve your career goals through flexible and affordable education!

FAQs:

Q: Does UGC recognize Gauhati University Distance Education?

A: Yes, GUCDOE is recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and approved by the Distance Education Bureau (DEB).

Q: What is the admission process for Gauhati University Distance Education?

A: The admission process is online. Candidates need to visit the website, fill up the application form, upload documents, and pay the fee to complete the process.

Q: Are there any entrance exams for Gauhati University Distance Education programs?

A: No, there are no entrance exams. Admissions are based on merit in the qualifying examination.

Q: What is the fee structure for different programs at Gauhati University Distance Education?

A: The fee varies by program. For UG courses it ranges from Rs. 8,000-30,000 per year, for PG courses Rs. 12,000-50,000 per year, and diploma courses Rs. 8,000-15,000 total.

Q: Does Gauhati University Distance Education provide study material to students?

A: Yes, GUCDOE provides self-learning study material to all enrolled students, along with access to e-resources and online lectures.

Q: Are there any contact classes or practical sessions at Gauhati University Distance Education?

A: Yes, GUCDOE conducts contact classes, practical sessions and workshop at designated study centers as per the program requirements. Attendance is mandatory.

Q: How can I check my admission status at Gauhati University Distance Education?

A: You can check your admission status by logging into your account on the GUCDOE website. You will also receive updates via email and SMS.

Q: What are the career prospects after pursuing a program from Gauhati University Distance Education?

A: GUCDOE programs are designed to enhance your knowledge, skills, and employability. Graduates can find job opportunities in various sectors or pursue higher education.
